CustomField.formula: IF (Tracking_Status__c == 'OK', 'OK', IF (Tracking_Status__c == 'RETUR', 'RETUR', IF (Tracking_Status__c == 'IP', 'IP', IF (Sent_Status__c == 'Sent', 'OK', IF (Sent_Status__c == 'Non Email', 'OK', IF (Delivery_Status__c == 'Success', 'OK', IF (Delivery_Status__c == 'Success, Received', 'OK', IF (Sent_Email_Status__c == 'Send', 'OK', IF (Sent_Email_Status__c == 'Non Email', 'OK','')))))))))
CustomField.label: DMU Status F
